entry.title: Sabbath: Experiencing and Living the Character of God - Lesson 12 Q4 2020

media:group.media:title: Sabbath: Experiencing and Living the Character of God - Lesson 12 Q4 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 4, lesson 12 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is â€œEducationâ€ and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled â€œSabbath: Experiencing and Living the Character of Godâ€. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Genesis 1, 2, Exod. 16:14â€“29, Isa. 58:1â€“14, Matt. 12:1â€“13, Luke 13:10â€“17.
Memory Text: â€œAnd He said to them, â€˜The Sabbath was made for man, and not man for the Sabbath. Therefore the Son of Man is also Lord of the Sabbathâ€™ â€ (Mark 2:27, 28, NKJV).
December 12â€“December 18
Sunday (Shelley Quinn) - â€œTime to Be Astonishedâ€ Monday (John Lomacang) - â€œTime for Rediscoveryâ€ Tuesday (Ryan Day) - â€œTime for Learning Prioritiesâ€ Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - â€œTime for Finding Balanceâ€ Thursday (John Dinzey) - â€œA Time for Community

entry.title: Why You Need the Faith of Jesus | Sermon by John Lomacang

media:group.media:title: Why You Need the Faith of Jesus | Sermon by John Lomacang
media:group.media:description:
Sermon by John Lomacang produced by 3ABN. The day of God is approaching and our faith as Christians will continue to be challenged. Those who keep the commandments of God and have the faith of Jesus will stand during the last days of earths history.
Don't forget to subscribe and click the bell so you get notified when we release the next video in this Worship Hour series.

entry.title: The Christian and Work | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 11 Q4 2020

media:group.media:title: The Christian and Work | Sabbath School Panel by 3ABN - Lesson 11 Q4 2020
media:group.media:description:
Sabbath School panel discussion and insight by 3ABN pastors and teachers. This video follows 2020 quarter 4, lesson 11 of the adult Bible study guide book. This quarter's book topic is â€œEducationâ€ and this week's Sabbath School lesson is titled â€œThe Christian and Workâ€. Join us every week for fresh and relevant study of the word of God.
Reading: Gen. 3:19, Deut. 16:15, Exod. 25:10â€“30:38, Gal. 5:22â€“26, Eccles. 9:10, 1 Cor. 10:31
Memory Text: â€œTherefore, my beloved brethren, be steadfast, immovable, always abounding in the work of the Lord, knowing that your labor is not in vain in the Lordâ€ (1 Corinthians 15:58, NKJV).
December 5â€“December 11
Sunday (John Lomacang) - â€œThe Many Sides of Workâ€ Monday (John Dinzey) - â€œWork and Nurtureâ€ Tuesday (Shelley Quinn) - â€œWork and Excellenceâ€ Wednesday (Jill Morikone) - â€œWork and Spiritualityâ€ Thursday (Ryan Day) - â€œWork and Stewardshipâ€
